page.title: 03EMPLOYMENT IN HUMBIE
page.content: WE SPOKE TO FORTY FIVE PEOPLE ABOUT THEIR JOBS.TEN PEOPLE WORK IN OUR AREA,FIFTEEN OUTSIDE AND TWENTY ARE RETIRED.MORE PEOPLE WORK OUTSIDE OUR SQUARE THAN INSIDE DUE TO LESS JOB OPPORTUNITIES HERE.EVERBODY WORKING OUTSIDE OUR SQUARE TRAVELS BY CAR AS PUBLIC TRANSPORT IS UNSUITABLE. HALF THE PEOPLE WHO WORK OUTSIDE OUR SQUARE WORK IN EDINBURGH AND THE OTHERS IN HADDINGTON,DALKEITH AND MUSSELBURGH WHICH ARE NEARBY TOWNS WITHIN TEN MILES.APART FROM DOMESTIC WORK PEOPLE WHO WORK INSIDE OUR SQUARE ARE FARMERS AND AGRICULTURAL WORKERS.PEOPLE WHO WORK OUTSIDE ARE INVOLVED IN LOTS OF DIFFERENT PROFESSIONS.EXAMPLES ARE TEACHING, MEDICAL,ARCHITECTURE AND LAW.
